fields.role: Provides dome shield for safe rotations and ultimate for final‑ring control.
fields.lead_when: When you can place dome to secure a position before ring pull.
fields.follow_when: When teammates need protection to push or rotate.
fields.disengage_when: When dome is on cooldown and enemies have high ground.

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with dome; hold when dome down.

ultimate.abort_conditions: Ring forces you into open before you can fire.

fight_flow.start: Place dome, scout, set up safe entry.
fight_flow.mid_fight: Maintain shield, use gunfire, coordinate with team.
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to escape or reset ring pull.

rotations.early_game: Secure a fortified spot with dome.
rotations.mid_game: Rotate early using dome as safe cover.
rotations.late_game: Ult to block pursuers and control final ring.
rotations.bad_rotation: Rotating without dome leaves you exposed.

fields.mental_rule: If you lack safe cover → dome first.
